item.description:
In our August meetup we talked about and deeply experienced how relaxing opens you to the flow and perspective of Source Energy/Spirit, and thus how you see things changes. By relaxing, you can almost seamlessly shift from problem consciousness to solution consciousness.

But how do you create "drama" and problem consciousness that gets you stressed out in the first place? You know those "Whoa is me..." or "I can't stand this.." and other similar feelings and thoughts.

This will be the topic of this month's meetup. We'll discuss how you create stressful emotions and reactions to the dramas in your life, and how you can prevent them. We'll be covering ideas that are different than the usual "use positive language and focus on positives", and leading you through some experiential exercises to learn how you can do this on your own in the future.

Hope you'll join us to add some more strategies to your repertoire for leading a joyful, easy life!

Thank you so much to those of you who have RSVP'd "yes" and showed up! PLEASE, PLEASE, only sign up if you know you can and will attend. We can only take a maximum of 20 people in our space, and do not want to exclude anyone unnecessarily because of a no-show. Help us reach our goal of 100% attendance for those who rsvp "yes"!

There's nothing better than feeling good and having fun! Please join us and stay "connected" by participating in our community's message board discussions and receiving our e-mails (which will include our "Good Vibrations" tips and news). To be able to do so, go to your account, and under "Your Groups", each one has an "Edit email settings". Set your preferences there. Hope to hear from you!

Eagerly looking forward to co-creating with you!


Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a very long driveway, with mailbox at street end. Please check files for further important instructions.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Seeing the world through "soft eyes" continued
